text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Raaaah!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, Bakushin, Bakushiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Bakushin O is in the lead, leaving the<n>other runners in the
dust!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Graaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Finish! Sakura Bakushin O is your<n>new Sprinters Stakes
champion!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Raaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Chirp, chirp...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I decide to head to the training course.<n>Despite it still being
early morning, I<n>spot Sakura Bakushin O there, hard at<n>
work.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Uraaagh! Bakushin, Bakushin,<n>Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I sit there, stunned. She's going even<n>faster than she was
in my dream! If<n>only she'd agree to be a sprinter...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I continue to watch her run, saddened<n>by the fact that she's
so hell-bent on<n>running in races ill-suited to her<n>talents.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... Phew! That'stoday's goals reached! Leave it to theclass representative to get stuff done!

text_block_list.name: New Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, Sakura Bakushin O! I<n>want to make you the top
sprinter in<n>the world! How does that sound?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your interest, but I'm<n>sorry! I must decline!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
After all, I have to set a good example<n>as class
representative!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O remains as<n>stubborn as always. As a
trainer, I<n>want to respect her decision, but it's<n>easier said
than done...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With that conundrum on my mind, I go<n>about my day. As the
sun sets, I take<n>one last trip to the training course.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Let me guess, Rice! You want me, the<n>class representative,
to give you<n>running tips, right?! You're looking to<n>me for
guidance, RIGHT?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: U-um...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: A-all I said was that you're fast...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
There's no need to be shy! As your<n>class representative, it
is my duty to<n>help any and all students in need!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
B-but, um... If you're around me for<n>too long, I'll just bring
you<n>misfortune...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Does... that mean you... don'twant my help?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I-I see... W-well, as your class<n>representative, I'm
disappointed, but...<n>I s-suppose I must soldier on...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Do you reeeally not need my help?<n>That's too bad...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah, um... Um...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: C-could you tell me... some tips on<n>winning?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: An EXCELLENT question, my dear<n>Rice!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eep!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now, allow me to impart to you the<n>true secret to winning!
And that is...<n>speed!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-speed?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Riddle me this, Rice... What do you<n>need to do in order to win
the race?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Reach the finish line before anyone<n>else, right?!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: R-right...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So in other words, in order to be the<n>strongest, you have to
be the fastest!<n>Not just at the beginning or end of the<n>race,
but at all times!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Such overwhelming speed is the true<n>key to victory!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I-I see...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My brow furrows. What she says<n>may seem simpleminded
at a glance,<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Clearly, that fixation on speed has<n>made Sakura Bakushin O
the powerful<n>runner she is today.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Phew... No better way to end the day<n>than being a helpful
class<n>representative! It feels good to be so<n>reliable!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Whoa! When did you get here?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hm? Um... Hello? Why are you staring<n>at me like that?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Overwhelming speed is the key to<n>victory. Just how far can
that ideology<n>take her...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, Bakushin, Bakushiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Bakushin O is in the lead, leaving the<n>other runners in the
dust!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Graaaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Surely it could take her farther than<n>that! My mind begins to
race as I<n>consider all the possibilities...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Yoo-hoo! Earth to Trainer! Is there<n>something you need from
me?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
All you trainers have been bugging<n>me since yesterday. It's
always "give<n>up on marathons" this and "but your<n>talents"
that!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So let me make this clear, I'm not<n>interested!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huh?
choice_data_list:
Let's make you the fastest Umamusume in the
world!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Th-the fastest?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Wait, we're talking about taking on<n>every single race—every
single<n>obstacle, right?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Me, the class representative, runningin EVERY SINGLE RACE, RIGHT?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: BAKUSHIIIN! At last, the trainer I've<n>been waiting for!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You've got yourself a deal! Starting<n>tomorrow, I'll be in your
capable<n>hands!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: With that, my journey with Bakushin<n>O begins.
